content: christmas tree wind spinner materials 2 5mm hook <1g brown 4ply yarn yarns pictured 2 5g green 4ply yarn sian s yarns superwash sock yarn in <1g white 4ply yarn gingerbread lime zest and snow row 1 using brown yarn chain 16 row 2 single_crochet into second stitch from hook single_crochet into next stitch 14 times 15 scs row 3 change to green ch2 counts as 1dc double_crochet x2 in same stitch as ch2 double_crochet x3 in next 4 stitches 15 double_crochet in total half_double_crochet x3 in next 5 stitches 15 hdcs single_crochet x3 in next 5 stitches 15sc row 4 ch1 counts as single_crochet single_crochet in same stitch then single_crochet x2 in next 14 spaces half_double_crochet x2 in next 15 stitches dcx2 in next 15 stitches row 5 change to white ch1 single_crochet in next stitch ch3 slip_stitch in base of chain *2sc ch3 slip_stitch in base of chain repeat to end cut yarn leaving a longish thread used for hanging and you re done row 1 row 2 row 3 row 4 www ravelry com/designers/sian-maloney thank you for using this pattern www siansyarns com @sians_yarns
